name: Healthyfied Wagyu Kebab Sticks
description: Indulge in the sumptuous taste of Healthyfied Wagyu Kebab Sticks, a perfect addition to your healthy recipe collection. Crafted for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet, these kebabs bring the luxurious flavor of wagyu steak into a health-conscious era. Whether you're looking for a nutritious meal option or simply aiming to maintain a healthy lifestyle, this recipe caters to your needs without compromising on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the 60.00 g of red bell peppers and the 80 grams of tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Chop 0.25 cup of raw red cabbage.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop 1 tsp of fresh rosemary, 1 tsp of fresh thyme, and 1 tsp of fresh basil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cube the 255.00 g wagyu sirloin steak into 1-inch pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your grill to a medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Skewer the wagyu steak cubes alternatively with slices of red bell peppers and tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the skewers with the chopped red cabbage, rosemary, thyme, and basil for added flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Grill the kebabs for about 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until the wagyu steak is cooked to your preferred doneness.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
